message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really value. I'm offering it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I'm not willing to go above $100.
I understand your position, Bob, but $100 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $115? It's a fair price for a product you'll clearly get a lot of use out of.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $115. How about we try $110? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go above $110.
